## IHeftBaseParameter interface

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

The base set of utility values provided in every object returned when registering a parameter.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IHeftBaseParameter<TValue, TCommandLineDefinition extends IBaseCommandLineDefinition> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [actionAssociated](./heft.iheftbaseparameter.actionassociated.md) | <code>readonly</code> | boolean | **_(BETA)_** If true, then the user has invoked Heft with a command line action that supports this parameter (as defined by the [IParameterAssociatedActionNames.associatedActionNames](./heft.iparameterassociatedactionnames.associatedactionnames.md) option). |
|  [definition](./heft.iheftbaseparameter.definition.md) | <code>readonly</code> | [IHeftRegisterParameterOptions](./heft.iheftregisterparameteroptions.md)<></>&lt;TCommandLineDefinition&gt; | **_(BETA)_** The options [IHeftRegisterParameterOptions](./heft.iheftregisterparameteroptions.md) used to create and register the parameter with a Heft command line action. |
|  [value?](./heft.iheftbaseparameter.value.md) | <code>readonly</code> | TValue | **_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ The value specified on the command line for this parameter. |
